name: Gem of Efficacious Toxin
flavorText: The poison mixers of Xiansai tell of a sickly gem cutter named Zhong Yi Rou who would come by their vats and scream "I'll put you all out of work someday! Yes I will!"
flavorTextHtml: The poison mixers of Xiansai tell of a sickly gem cutter named Zhong Yi Rou who would come by their vats and scream "I'll put you all out of work someday! Yes I will!"

secondary.textHtml: Poison all enemies hit for 2000% weapon damage over 10 seconds. 2000%
secondary.text: Poison all enemies hit for 2000% weapon damage over 10 seconds. 2000%
